TopicTitle: Building the Kerbal Space Program community

Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I would love to get some feedback on a gaming website I'm working on with some friends. We are still in an early development phase, but I would love to see more Kerbal Space Program content on the site. I thought I ask here if someone might be interested in helping us growing our Kerbal Space Program community or wants to contribute to it every once in a while.

Here is the link to our Kerbal Space Program community, as you can see we need a lot of help with it

http://www.anook.com/game/kerbal-space-program

Thank you for reading,

exelor
